text: Ushan Çakır (born 23 May 1984) is a Turkish actor. He became known for the character Arda he played in Leyla and Mecnun in 2011. Ushan Çakır graduated from Istanbul State Conservatory and has participated in a number of dramatic performances as well as playing theater. In 2011, it was reported that Ushan Çakır had essayed to strangle the actress Ezgi Asaroğlu.
